May the renewal of life bring blessings of hope, peace, good health, and happiness to you and yours. Happy Easter!

I am shocked and deeply saddened by the loss of Coby Mach. He will be remembered for his dedication to our great state, his talent on the air, and the joy he brought to his family, friends, and all those who knew him.  My thoughts and prayers are with his family.

Tonight congressional Democrats requested @POTUS’s tax returns from the IRS and I strongly oppose this action. The Ways & Means Committee on which I serve has the authority to request them, but this is not part of any legitimate investigation and is therefore an abuse of power.
